entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning this evening and ending before morning. Snow level lowering to 1000 metres near midnight. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 6:24 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early in the morning. Snow level 1000 metres. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:24 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending before morning then cloudy. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to near valley bottom near midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 6:24 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
